meanings.definition: Not allied or connected in any way.
meanings.sent1: The two groups were unallied and did not work together.
meanings.sent2: The countries remained unallied despite the common threat.
meanings.sent3: The unallied teams ended up competing against each other in the final.
meanings.sent4: Her unallied stance made her a lone wolf in the political arena.
meanings.sent5: The unallied nations stood alone against the invading forces.

meanings.definition: Not related or associated with something else.
meanings.sent1: His unallied opinions surprised everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The unallied events seemed to happen by pure coincidence.
meanings.sent3: The unallied colors clashed horribly in the painting.
meanings.sent4: Her unallied interests made her a unique individual in the group.
meanings.sent5: The unallied facts stood out starkly against the background of the report.
